Actions.Name: Get film by ID
Actions.Description: Returns a film based on a single ID.

Actions.Name: Gets all films
Actions.Description: The Films endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli films.

Actions.Name: Get all locations
Actions.Description: The Locations endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli locations. This broadly includes lands, countries, and places.

Actions.Name: Get all people
Actions.Description: The People endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli people. This broadly includes all Ghibli characters, human and non-.

Actions.Name: Get person by ID
Actions.Description: Returns a person based on a single ID.

Actions.Name: Get all species
Actions.Description: The Species endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli species. This includes humans, animals, and spirits et al.

Actions.Name: Get all vehicles
Actions.Description: The Vehicles endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli vehicles. This includes cars, ships, and planes.
